name: VentureApp
title: Venture App
textContent: This is a product recently designed by my colleagues and I
as a previous project. Simply think about a project idea and
brainstorm about what features & functions it could have, how
technology could be used in new ways, or a better way to do
something, a new market or a new user community to serve, an
important problem to solve!
Conduct research in the market of to find existing products
that represent similar ideas to your group's idea. The
rational is to use this research as a starting point for
design. We would use techniques to identify the strengths and
weaknesses of these companies, and find the current market trends
that would need to be considered for our own product.
Our Idea starts as a dating app that doubles back as an event finder app. It pairs potential
matches by your interests of exploring the local community and location. Instead of
allowing your first communication to be through messaging, you will be encouraged to
first choose a date and start your first point of communication there.  Users can span from local
residents and college students to people who are just passing through ( business men,
politicians, tourists, etc ). Really it doesn't matter who the person is, it doesn't even have
to be a date, it can be used for people moving to new towns trying to find new
companions to explore their new surroundings. Whatever the situation may be the
clear motive is to push people to not forget the outside world and to push for
physical communication and interaction through their next adventure.

name: SWANK
title: SWANK Online Retailer
textContent: SWANK is an online retailer that needed a mockup design of their landing page.
This landing page would set the tone of the rest of the website.
